titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that normal trade relations treatment for products of the People's Republic of China should be revoked if that country attacks, invades, or imposes a blockade on Taiwan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/24/2000--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that pursuant to article XXI of the GATT 1994, nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) should be withdrawn from the products of the People's Republic of China if that country attacks, invades, or imposes a blockade on Taiwan, in addition to whatever other measures the United States might take to assist Taiwan.
